snippet.title: Rune Coliseum - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Learn about Rune Coliseum in this overview, including gameplay and more, from this upcoming deck-building roguelike game featuring a semi-real-time combat system. In Rune Coliseum, step into the shoes of an ancient gladiator and do your best to survive in the coliseum. Combine various skills and equipment, develop your own fighting style, and defeat all the enemies to become the next champion. Rune Coliseum will be available on PC in 2024.

#GameTrailers #SoG
